titleStmt.title: A compend of chronography: containing four thousand thirty yeers complet, from Adams creation to Christs birth. As an harbinger to two larger tomes, in pawn of the authors promiss: which he intends to perform, if God shal permit. / By Rob. Vilvain of Excester. Price at press 3 d.
titleStmt.author: Vilvain, Robert, 1575?-1663.

titleStmt.title: A compend of chronography: containing four thousand thirty yeers complet, from Adams creation to Christs birth. As an harbinger to two larger tomes, in pawn of the authors promiss: which he intends to perform, if God shal permit. / By Rob. Vilvain of Excester. Price at press 3 d.
titleStmt.author: Vilvain, Robert, 1575?-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Hodgkinsonne (for the author) and are to be sold at his house in Thames street, neer Baynards Castle,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb 28 1656";"came not [to] hand till now".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
